title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 398: Featuring Johnny Gaudreau
description:
On Episode 398 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Johnny Gaudreau. Johnny joined (36:46) to talk about breaking the internet this past week when he signed with the Blue Jackets. He discussed what led to his decision and what other team he almost ended up with. The boys also talked about all the other free agency drama over the past week. So many signings, trades and the guys broke it all down. The boys wrap up with some Chiclets Cup talk and some British Open chatter.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
